title: I have a huge issue please help!
body: Today i started to update my client to the open beta but every time it just downloads like 300 mb or something like that and shows me an error and an option to try again and i tried like 3 times every time it does the same problem and i can't play league now. is there anything that i can do to go back to my legacy client cause i'm stuck now and i must update the client in order to play but in the same time the update never complete and i have to start it from the begining and it's like a loop i can't get out from ... please help :(

replies.body: Do you have enough space on your hard drive?
It sounds like something is blocking you from finishing your update.  To find out more, at what percent exactly are you having an error?  Is it an unspecified error?  Let me know!
